Two years in development, Age Confidence Facial Oil Echium & Amaranth is a luxurious facial oil treatment which delivers a super-charged dose of vitamins, nutrients and essential fatty acids to the skin and help to optimise hydration and regeneration, whilst minimising inflammation and environmental stress.
Echium, the richest known plant source of Gamma Linolenic Acid and Stearidonic Acid accelerates skin cell regeneration to smooth fine lines and wrinkles. It also deeply conditions and repairs the skin at cellular level whilst calming sensitive skin types and delivering powerful forms of Omegas 3 & 6.
Age Confidence Facial Oil contains Amaranth which is one of the only natural sources of Squalene - an unparalleled moisturising agent which works to quench the skin. It replenishes the skin’s natural oil levels and locks in moisture whilst increasing the suppleness and elasticity of the skin. It’s the perfect natural ingredient for both softening skin and preventing the formation of fine lines and wrinkles. This key ingredient also provides antioxidant properties which repair and protect the skin against the ageing effects of free radical damage.
Additional breakthrough ingredient Guggul Oil performs a key role in increasing the skin’s metabolism for a brighter, more revitalised complexion. Its ability to inhibit the enzyme that breaks down collagen also results in plumper, firmer skin that naturally stays smoother for longer.
Age Confidence Facial Oil Echium & Amaranth is infused with a blend of nutritious oils including Argan, Kukui, Sea Buckthorn and Macadamia. Argan Oil boasts high levels of antioxidant Vitamin E and Omegas 3, 6 & 9 which heal and restore the skin and works with Sea Buckthorn Oil to provide essential antioxidant protection. Kukui Oil repairs and strengthens the skins essential moisture barrier whilst Macadamia Oil replenishes the skins level of Palmitoleic Acid to fight visible signs of ageing.
Think of Age Confidence Facial Oil Echium & Amaranth as one of your five a day. Together with a good diet, healthy lifestyle and plenty of sleep, the nourishing formula will help you achieve complete confidence in your glowing complexion.

product_description:
Clinically advanced serum to rehydrate skin and reduce the appearance of lines and wrinkles.
Fragrance free and lightweight SubQ Anti Age Advanced Serum is the perfect serum for wearing under moisturiser day and night. With five forms of hyaluronic compounds fine lines, wrinkles, sagging skin and uneven tone and texture are improved whilst being intensely hydrated. Absorbing quickly and easily in to the skin without fragrance or irritable chemicals, achieving plump, healthy looking skin has never been so easy.

Zelens Youth Concentrate Supreme Age Defying Serum is an anti-ageing treatment which helps to combat all aspects of skin ageing.
This revolutionary anti-ageing serum has an exclusive formula which is based on the research inspired by a Nobel-prize winning discovery on the role of telomeres in ageing. Telomeres are DNA sequences regulating the life of the cells and Telomere protection helps to maintain healthy cell division and extends cells' youthful life span.
Powered by a unique complex of potent anti-ageing actives, Youth Concentrate Supreme Age Defying Serum intensively reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles by extending the youth span of skin cells.
Youth Concentrate Supreme Age Defying Serum is fortified with 8 potent Peptides that work in synergy with other active ingredients to extend the youth span of the skin and provide a long-lasting anti-ageing effect. Telomere Protection Complex contains four peptides to protect telomeres and support cell survival whilst Chronopeptide promotes skin regeneration through the expression of circadian genes.
Zelens' unique Anti-Ageing Peptide Complex increases the total collagen production to achieve a visibly smoother and younger looking skin as Encapsulated Retinol allows slow release of Vitamin A to boost epidermal thickening without irritation.
Youth Concentrate Supreme Age Defying Serum is also infused with Hyaluronic Acid to restore a healthy moisture balance and plump the skin whilst Silanols, organic derivatives of Silicones produced in the presence Alginic Acid extracted from Brown Algae stimulates fibroblast proliferation and activate collagen production. This key ingredient has an important role in wound healing and restructuring of the connective tissue and also demonstrates moisturising, antioxidant and anti-glycation properties.
Sure to be a Beauty Bay best seller, Youth Concentrate Supreme Age Defying Serum leaves the skin perfectly hydrated with improved elasticity and firmness whilst the complexion feels smother and looks visibly younger.
product_name: Youth Concentrate Supreme Age Defying Serum 30ml

product_description: An anti-ageing and anti-dark spot serum with high sun protection to prevent photo-ageing. Formulated to simultaneously target multiple signs of skin-ageing, this hard-working cream is more than just a regular SPF. ItÉs packed with active ingredients which help to boost hydration, lighten pigmentation, and smooth uneven texture, resulting in brighter, firmer, smoother skin. The weightless texture absorbs easily, coating skin in a layer of protective UV filters that prevent sun from worsening pigmentation and causing further damage.

Cellex C Sun Care SPF50+ Broad Spectrum Moisturizing Sunscreen effectively protects the skin against damaging UV rays whilst nourishing and healing the face, neck and body.
PABA and Fragrance-free, Sun Care SPF50+ Broad Spectrum Moisturizing Sunscreen magically infuses the skin with complete protection from both UVA and UVB rays which can have uber-damaging effects on the body and skin. Ideal for use on the face, neck, chest and body, this high-tech sun protection cream boasts a non-comedogenic formula, ensuring that the skin always looks healthy, clear and radiant.
Preventing premature skin-ageing caused by the sun and other environmental aggressor factors, Sun Care SPF50+ Broad Spectrum Moisturizing Sunscreen allows everybody to enjoy the sun in a smart and safe way. Suitable for all skin types, this wonderful sunscreen is crafted using Vitamin E to deeply nourish the skin whilst also soothing irritation miraculously.
Use this versatile cream to not only protect the skin against the sun's rays, but also to stop the signs of ageing and provide a clearer complexion effortlessly.
product_name: Sun Care SPF50+ Broad Spectrum Moisturizing Sunscreen 120ml

product_description:
A lightweight moisturising treatment which boosts and supports skin's natural methods of hydration.
Dehydrated skin suffers from a shortage of the compounds naturally produced by skin to maintain hydration levels. This clever formula is made up of these ingredients that are naturally present in the skin - meaning that it rehydrates skin in the most natural and effective way possible.

Pai Skin Care Rice Plant & Rosemary BioAffinity Toner is an alcohol free, calming, toning and balancing toner for combination skin types.
This formula is unique in containing pure 'living waters' extracted directly from the plant and with regular use, these vitamin and mineral rich elixirs help to calm, rebalance and decongest combination and sensitive skin.
Plants are naturally rich in a multitude of hydro-soluble compounds. The waters circulating within them absorb important nutrients from the earth, and inherit a unique combination of amino acids, vitamins and trace mineral elements. These 'living waters' have the exact pH and resistivity balance of healthy skin, giving them unparalleled skin affinity while improving skin tone and texture.
Commonly, toners are composed of an inert and demineralised floral water or alcohol base with few skin benefits. Pai Skin Care however, does not use alcohol, (even natural grain varieties) as it strips the face of natural oils, often leading to excess sebum production and breakouts.
Products containing alcohol are also unsuitable for sensitive skin and Rosacea sufferers.
Skin is soothed, balanced and refreshed.

Yes To Tomatoes Daily Clarifying Cleanser is a glorious face wash for oily and combination skin types.
Designed to maintain your skinÉs natural pH balance whilst removing excess oils and impurities, Tomatoes Daily Clarifying Cleanser purifies and refreshes the complexion whilst helping to control breakouts.
Tomatoes help to protect the skin from environmental agents that contribute to clogged pores and breakouts and provide the skin with potent antioxidant and anti-inflammatory benefits. Tomatoes Daily Clarifying Cleanser also helps to control sebum and oil production in the skin with Fruit Acids whilst Red Tea works to keep the complexion clear and healthy.
Sure to be a Beauty Bay best-seller, Tomatoes Daily Clarifying Cleanser also utilises Watermelon to hydrate the skin and naturally exfoliate and cleanse, leaving the complexion looking clear, healthy and radiant.

A redness diminishing face mask designed for sensitive, dry or troubled skin.

product_description:
BIOEFFECT EGF Eye Serum is a breakthrough anti-ageing eye treatment which firms and revitalises the delicate eye area.
Boasting a refreshing gel like formula which immediately rebalances moisture levels and provides long term anti-ageing benefits to shield against the formation of wrinkles and crows' feet, EGF Eye Serum also helps to reduce the appearance of under eye puffiness.
The key ingredient in this innovative eye serum is EGF (Epidermal Growth Factor); a substance which occurs naturally in human skin and has the ability to increase the rate of cell turnover within the skin. While the skin is young, it produces enough of its own EGF to maintain its youthful radiance. As we age, the skin slows its natural production of EGF and begins to lose firmness and elasticity. Fine lines appear and the surface epidermis becomes duller in appearance. Over time the amount of collagen and elastin in the skinÈs dermal layers dwindles, skin grows thinner and wrinkles begin to form. By applying EGF Eye Serum to the delicate eye area, it is possible to stimulate the natural process of cell renewal and minimise the visible effect of skin ageing.
EGF Eye Serum increases collagen intensity around the eye area and visibly smoothes the appearance of wrinkles whilst promoting firmness and elasticity, leaving the eyes looking fresh, youthful and radiant.

The key ingredient in this serum is EGF (Epidermal Growth Factor); a substance which occurs naturally in human skin and has the ability to increase the rate of cell turnover within the skin. While the skin is young, it produces enough of its own EGF to maintain its youthful radiance. As we age, the skin slows its natural production of EGF and begins to lose firmness and elasticity. Fine lines appear and the surface epidermis becomes duller in appearance. Over time the amount of collagen and elastin in the skin‘s dermal layers dwindles, skin grows thinner and wrinkles begin to form. ARgENTUM La Potion Infinie is an award winning anti-ageing cream which has a profound effect on the skin.
An all-encompassing treatment of wrinkles, facial blemishes and oxidative stress, La Potion Infinie has a patented formula which harnesses two vital ingredients Silver Hydrosol and DNA HP to offer super hydrating and restorative benefits.
The culmination of many years of research into skin ageing, La Potion Infinie promotes topical application to combat the principal causes of ageing. The ultimate refinement and purity of colloidal Silver, Silver Hydrosol delivers powerful anti-inflammatory and antibacterial properties and effectively fights free radical aggression and promote tissue regeneration for a more youthful complexion.
Based on the work of Nobel Prize winning scientists, DNA HP isa natural marine sourced ingredient which works by trapping a toxic radical, namely Hydroxyl which causes oxidationand degradation of Collagen and Elastin to maintain a youthful appearance. DNA HP simply attempts to trap water into the skin to promote and increase skin hydration by carrying 10,000 times its weight in water.
99.5% from natural origins, La Potion Infinie has a high molecule weight which results in excellent absorption to enable optimal hydration and has a bioactive formula which decreases the appearance of wrinkles by up to 35% and has an immediate tightening effect on the skin.
A true skincare revolution, La Potion Infinie promotes a clearer, more luminous complexion with noticeably fewer blemishes with visibly hydrated skin for a boost of youthful radiance.

Lanolin is a naturally produced blend of oils and waxes that are extracted from the wool of sheep shorn in the summer and is scientifically proved to be one of the most similar natural substances to our own skins natural blend of oils.

It also helps to heal sore, chapped noses, sooth chapped and irritated nipples, eliminate split ends in the hair and moisturise eye lashes.
Considered by dermatologists and pharmacists alike to be one of the safest and most effective natural products to care for your skin, Original Nipple Balm For Dry Skin, Luscious Lips & Glossy Bits is medically proven to reduce skin roughness by up to 40% in just 1 hour, increase epithelial healing by 35% to heal wounds, burns, abrasions & minor incisions and is safe enough to ease the effects of nappy rash on infants and chapped nipples on nursing mums.
Sure to be a BeautyBay best-seller, Original Nipple Balm For Dry Skin, Luscious Lips & Glossy Bits is a handbag essential and leaves the lips lusciously soft, sexy and glossy whilst sensitive, irritated and dry skin is healed, soothed and moisturised.

product_description:

Offering a gentle exfoliation at a 10% concentration, this lightweight serum works to improve skin texture, reducing pigmentation caused by acne scars and age spots by stimulating cell regeneration. The addition of hyaluronic acid strengthens the lipid barrier to improve the skinÉs ability to attract and retain moisture, leading to healthier, stronger skin.

This oil absorbent powder will help to unclog congested pores to prevent blackheads and promote a healthier complexion. Infused with a Mineral rich blend of Calcium Carbonate, Kaolin and Zinc Oxide, Silver Powder transforms into a paste style mask when mixed with water and works effectively to remove unsightly blackheads from the skin.
Suitable for all skin types, Silver Powder absorbs excess oil and delivers immediate results for a clearer, healthier complexion.

Institut Esthederm Intensive Vitamine C Concentrated Cream is an advanced treatment cream, which effectively fights wrinkles and pigmentation spots.
This triple action cream works to fight dark spots, wrinkles and guard against free radicals, helping improve firmness and skin tone. Skin has less noticeable brown spots, with more radiant skin, plus visibly diminished wrinkles and fine lines.

BIOEFFECT DAYTIME is a luxurious anti-aging day cream which intensely nourishes skin and provides ground-breaking results against the signs of aging.
Featuring BIOEFFECT’s innovative key ingredient EGF (Epidermal Growth Factor), this substance occurs naturally in human skin and has the ability to increase the rate of cell turnover within the skin. While the skin is young, it produces enough of its own EGF to maintain its youthful radiance. As we age, the skin slows its natural production of EGF and begins to lose firmness and elasticity. Fine lines appear and the surface epidermis becomes duller in appearance. Over time the amount of collagen and elastin in the skin‘s dermal layers dwindles, skin grows thinner and wrinkles begin to form. By applying BIOEFFECT DAYTIME to the skin, it is possible to stimulate the natural process of cell renewal and minimise the visible effect of skin ageing.
Suitable for all skin types this innovative day cream plumps, firms and hydrates skin to recreate a youthful and radiant complexion. Especially designed for those who want to retain their skin’s youthful glow and demand fast, visible results from their skincare products, BIOEFFECT DAYTIME has been specifically developed as an active complement to the highly credited EGF SERUM to prolong and intensify the results.
Free from Parabens this nourishing anti-aging cream restores a youthful glow whilst rehydrating and firming the skin so it is left looking healthier and younger and feeling silky soft. It also creates the perfect base for foundation application.

S.W.BASICS Cream is a rich moisturiser which can be used on the face and body.
Suitable for all skin types as it contains only 3 Fair Trade and Organic ingredients, S.W.BASICS Cream has an extremely rich texture which sinks deep into the skin and delivers exceptional nourishment and hydration throughout the day.
Enriched with Fair Trade Wild Harvested Shea Butter from Ghana and a blend of Extra Virgin Coconut and Olive Oils, S.W.BASICS Cream won’t clog the pores and leaves the skin beautifully soft, rejuvenated and healthy.

BIOEFFECT EGF DAY SERUM is an advanced anti-ageing serum specially formulated for daytime use.
An ideal makeup base, EGF DAY SERUM restores the skin's moisture balance and provides a silky smooth skin texture. Promoting denser and firmer skin, and reducing the appearance of wrinkles and enlarged pores, EGF DAY SERUM delivers multiple anti-ageing benefits and is sure to be a Beauty Bay best-seller.
EGF DAY SERUM is enriched with BIOEFFECT's innovative key ingredient EGF (Epidermal Growth Factor); this substance occurs naturally in human skin and has the ability to increase the rate of cell turnover within the skin. While the skin is young, it produces enough of its own EGF to maintain its youthful radiance. As we age, the skin slows its natural production of EGF and begins to lose firmness and elasticity. Fine lines appear and the surface epidermis becomes duller in appearance. Over time the amount of collagen and elastin in the skin's dermal layers dwindles, skin grows thinner and wrinkles begin to form. By applying EGF DAY SERUM to the skin, it is possible to stimulate the natural process of cell renewal and minimise the visible effect of skin ageing.
Suitable for all skin types, EGF DAY SERUM allows your skin to breathe and won't clog up the pores whilst active ingredients work together to increase production levels of Collagen and Elastin within the skin reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles making your skin appear more toned and refined.

BIOEFFECT DAYTIME RICH For Dry Skin is a revised version of the BIOEFFECT DAYTIME Moisturiser specifically developed to meet the needs of dry and very dry skin.
The new luxurious blend is quickly absorbed into the skin and is suitable for all skin types but in particular for those people whose complexion seeks to maintain normal moisture levels throughout the day.
The highly claimed Icelandic company have included the same EGF cellular activator as other BIOEFFECT products to restore the moisture level of dry skin and renew the skin's youthful glow by gently breaking down dead skin cells.
BIOEFFECT's innovative key ingredient EGF (Epidermal Growth Factor), this substance occurs naturally in human skin and has the ability to increase the rate of cell turnover within the skin. While the skin is young, it produces enough of its own EGF to maintain its youthful radiance. As we age, the skin slows its natural production of EGF and begins to lose firmness and elasticity. Fine lines appear and the surface epidermis becomes duller in appearance. Over time the amount of collagen and elastin in the skin's dermal layers dwindles, skin grows thinner and wrinkles begin to form. By applying DAYTIME RICH For Dry Skin to the skin, it is possible to stimulate the natural process of cell renewal and minimise the visible effect of skin ageing.
The rich lightweight formula allows your skin to breathe and won't clog up the pores whilst active ingredients work together to increase production levels of Collagen and Elastin within the skin reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles making your skin appear more toned and refined.
Creating the perfect base for foundation application, DAYTIME RICH For Dry Skin nourishes and rehydrates skin for a healthy, plump complexion.
_Did You Know? BIOEFFECT was the first skin care product to contain Cellular Activators made in plants.  _

This combines deep yet gentle cleansing with a skincare treatment in one sweep-on liquid, enriched with soothing, moisturising and pore-plumping ingredients that leave skin feeling supple and fresh.
For those who haven't used micellar water before, they're liquid solutions made up of micelles, which are tiny balls of cleansing oil molecules that draw out impurities. These micelles are suspended in a softening water, so you can pour it onto a cotton pad and glide over skin to whisk away makeup, oil and grime.
Filorga's anti-ageing take on a micellar water gets skin cleansed and fresh in seconds, and because it's so effective, there's no rubbing required when you smooth it on. Best of all, it's ultra-gentle and doesn't strip your skin, so even those with sensitive complexions will find it soothing and refreshing.

Illumiscin® reduces the total area of hyperpigmentation whilst Niacinamide PC reduces the size of age spots and helps restore the skins natural equilibrium.
Chromabright is infused with Caffeine to maintain a healthy skin tone and restores firmness whilst Lipchriman-6 is a strong anti-oxidant which prevents future hyperpigmentation.
Especially effective on the face, décolleté and tops of hands, De Spot Skin Brightening Corrector helps prevent the appearance of future discolouration and maintains the skin tone clarity and firmness.

A purifying face mask.
For a smoother, clearer complexion, Jeju Skin Purifying Jelly Mask removes excess oils and soothes skin. Made with Seaweed, impurities are drawn out of the pores for a deep cleanse that leaves skin healthy and rejuvenated.

Filorga Scrub & Mask Reoxygenating Exfoliating Mask doubles up as an exfoliator plus a mask, to slough away any dulling dead skin cells.
Oxygen plays a fundamental role in maintaining healthy skin cells, helping them to function as they should for a more youthful-looking complexion. The oxygen transportation system in this mask traps oxygen in the air, and transports it to your cells to help them regain their natural dynamism.
Meanwhile, the scrubbing action and enzymatic exfoliation encourages cell renewal - a process that should happen every 28 days, but slows to once every 40 days as we age. By exfoliating skin with Spheres of Perlite, a rare volcanic glass, dead skin cells are removed, while the spheres' absorbent properties have a mattifying effect on your complexion.

product_description:
A purifying cleanser for oily skin.
For a deep pore cleanse, French Clay Foam Cleanser can be used daily to clean and combat blocked pores. Gently exfoliating, makeup, dirt and dead skin cells are swept away from the skin for controlled oil production and a smooth, shiny complexion.

Dr Brandt Pores No More Pore Effect is an effective refining cream ideal for oily and combination skin.
Infused with Salicylic Acid to stimulate cellular turnover and clean pores, Pores No More Pore Effect controls excess oil and effectively fights bacteria. Tea Tree and Rosemary penetrate pores deeply to eliminate blockage whilst Lavender Extract and Palma Rosa calm irritated or sensitive skin with a clarifying action that is gentle yet effective on all skin types.
No matter where you live, everyday pollutants and free radicals cause pore-clogging debris to nestle below the skin’s surface; this pore decongestant treatment helps to refine and tighten pores whilst providing essential hydration for the skin.

Zelens The Balm is an innovative lip treatment which soothes, moisturises and protects the lips.
Addictively restorative and nourishing, The Balm is set to become your handbag essential for smooth, plump and well hydrated lips. Enriched with a natural blend of Oils, Butters, Essential Fatty Acids, Phospholipids, Ceramides and Glycolipds The Balm hydrates, regenerates and repairs the lips.
This unique lip treatment also utilises Vitamin A to regenerate lip tissue whilst Vector Technology enriched with Hyaluronic Acid Microspheres effectively plump the lips and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for a smoother, more youthful lip appearance. Infused with Polyphenols derived from Green Shiso Leaves, The Balm also helps to shield the lips from oxidative stress and free radical damage.
The Balm provides long lasting barrier protection and hydration and leaves the lips looking and feeling healthy, nourished and visibly plump and radiant.

EOS Smooth Sphere Sweet Mint Lip Balm is a 95% Organic lip balm which moisturises and protects the lips.
Deliciously sweet and refreshing, Smooth Sphere Sweet Mint Lip Balm provides lost lasting moisture with a 100% natural formula. Enriched with Shea butter and Vitamin E, Smooth Sphere Sweet Mint Lip Balm keeps the lips moist, soft and sensationally smooth whilst Vitamin E provides essential antioxidant protection.
The patented sphere design glides precisely on the lips and imparts a clear veil of moisture and protection whilst the Paraben and Petrolatum free formula nourishes all skin types. The refreshing Sweet mint flavour gives the lips the moisture they crave.
product_name: Smooth Sphere Sweet Mint Lip Balm 7g

product_description:
Mario Badescu Caviar Day Cream (29ml) is a rich moisturiser which nourishes, protects and hydrates mature skin types.
Great for dry, dehydrated and mature complexions, Caviar Day Cream has a luxurious formula enriched with Caviar and helps to protect and soften delicate skin. Caviar Day Cream is perfect for use during the colder seasons to protect the skin from harsh environmental aggressors and leaves the skin lusciously soft, hydrated and healthy with a youthful glow.

A moisturising lip balm with built in sun protection.
Hydrating the lips, SPF30 Active Protection Smooth Sphere Lip Balm treats, softens and protects. Perfect for holidays and beach days, the fresh grapefruit flavour is water-resistant for up to 80 minutes and smooths on clear.
product_name: SPF30 Active Protection Smooth Sphere Lip Balm 7g

product_description:
Resultime Wrinkle Firmness Cellular Night Cream is a high performance night treatment which combats signs of ageing during your mid 30És and 40És.
Enriched with a secret active ingredient which repairs the skin whilst you sleep, Wrinkle Firmness Cellular Night Cream helps to regenerate and prolong skin cell life and smooth fine lines and wrinkles.
Formulated with ResultimeÉs patented Vectorised Micro Collagen, Wrinkle Firmness Cellular Night Cream transports highly active miniature fragments of natural Collagen into the lower levels of the epidermis by a vector and works to smooth the skinÉs micro-texture on the surface, stimulate the production of Collagen and Hyaluronic Acid and activate the cellular metabolism for complete anti-ageing regeneration and prevention.
Wrinkle Firmness Cellular Night Cream is ideal for skin which is losing firmness and helps to promote the skinÉs natural defences, leaving the complexion looking smooth, radiant and youthful.

Starskin The Master Cleanser Detox Sea Kelp Leaf Cleansing Foam is a luxuriously refreshing cleanser that targets the skin at a cellular level.
With the ability to effectively remove makeup, dirt and daily grime from the complexion, The Master Cleanser Detox Sea Kelp Leaf Cleansing Foam truly transforms the skin, resulting in a rejuvenated, hydrated and radiant finish that will get you noticed by absolutely everyone.
Perfect for refuelling the complexion after a heavy weekend of parties and lack of sleep, The Master Cleanser Detox Sea Kelp Leaf Cleansing Foam provides the skin with a spa-like treatment from the comfort of your own home, making it a certifiable beauty essential for any social butterfly who is constantly on-the-go.
Guaranteed to provide a 72 hour-long glow to the skin, The Master Cleanser Detox Sea Kelp Leaf Cleansing Foam gently yet effectively exfoliates the complexion, removing all traces of dead skin cells and leftover makeup and daily dirt.
Infused with Pure Glacier Water from the Swiss Alps and Sea Kelp Leaves, this decadent cleanser detoxifies the skin, whilst the addition of Sea Cucumber and Green Caviar ensures that this facial refresher deeply invigorates the complexion, resulting in a pure, clear effect.
Suitable for all skin types, The Master Cleanser Detox Sea Kelp Leaf Cleansing Foam is crafted without the use of Chemical Preservatives and is fabulously dermatologically tested to guarantee the optimal results.
Master the power of nature with The Master Cleanser Detox Sea Kelp Leaf Cleansing Foam.
product_name: The Master Cleanser Detox Sea Kelp Leaf Cleansing Foam 150ml

product_description:
A Korean inspired lip balm.
Rich and nourishing, Oh K! Lip Balm White Peach moisturises and softens lips. A daily treatment and protection, the fruity white peach balm comes in a compact bear dispenser for easy, travel friendly use.
product_name: Oh K! Lip Balm White Peach 5.6g

product_description:
Mario Badescu Carnation Eye Make Up Remover Oil (59ml) is a lightweight, gentle eye makeup remover for all skin types.
Formulated with a blend of Mineral Oil, Sesame Oil and Floral Extracts, this oil effectively clears away even the most stubborn, water proof eye makeup, yet wont strip or over dry the delicate eye area. Skin is left smooth, supple and soft and perfectly cleansed.
product_name: Carnation Eye Make Up Remover Oil

product_description:
A hydrating face mask developed for mature, aging skin.
Created to achieve glowing, younger looking skin, the Vitamin B3 & White Tea Anti Aging Face Mask is a skincare essential. Infused with elasticity boosting properties, this creamy facial treatment provides antioxidants protecting from damaging free radicals and helping to maintain a smooth, youthful complexion.

This Works Energy Bank Sun Flash is your daily dose of sunshine in a bottle.
Sunshine does everyone the world of good, so when we don't get the sun it can leave us feeling blue and our energy levels feel a little lower than usual.
Energy Bank Sun Flash contains Natural Oils and essential Multi-Vitamins found in sun power to revive and brighten your skin for healthier looking skin. Added Caramel and Hyaluronic Acid in the unique formula deliver a natural glow of radiant colour to the skin. Giving you the option to use alone or mix with your favourite moisturiser, Energy Bank Sun Flash is perfect for daily use and will leave your skin soft to touch, refreshed and thoroughly recharged.

Cellex-C Advanced C Skin Tightening Cream is a lightweight treatment which offers exceptional anti-ageing benefits.
Enriched with a high concentration of the revolutionary Cellex C Complex, Advanced C Skin Tightening Cream is enriched with 17.5% Vitamin C in a scientifically formulated combination of Hydrolysed and Free Form Ascorbic Acid to protect the skin against oxidative stress and promote collagen synthesis.
Powerful Antioxidants such as Grape Seed Extract nutritionally supports the micro-vascular health of the skin by protecting cells within capillaries from free radical damage whilst L’ergothioneine protects skin tissue from high oxidative stress. Non-greasy and boasting an Emollient rich base, Advanced C Skin Tightening Cream restores a smooth texture and healthy glow to the complexion.
Advanced C Skin Tightening Cream also utilises Resveratrol which protects collagen by supporting existing structures and inhibiting enzyme degradation. Suitable for all skin types except oily and acne prone skin, Advanced C Skin Tightening Cream helps to increase elasticity and resilience to greatly reduce the appearance of sagging skin, fine lines, wrinkles and age spots.
Within 4-6 weeks of daily use, Advanced C Skin Tightening Cream generally improves the overall appearance of the skin and leaves the complexion looking smooth, youthful and radiant.

Mario Badescu Complex Moisturizer With Vitamin E SPF20 (60ml) is a protective facial sunscreen for dry and mature skin types.
Rich and creamy, Complex Moisturizer With Vitamin E SPF20 is enriched with Vitamins A & E which lock in the skin’s natural moisture and offers daily protection against free radical aggressors. Used alone or under makeup, Complex Moisturizer With Vitamin E SPF20 shields the skin against sun damage and utilises Peanut Oil to soften and smooth the complexion.
product_name: Complex Moisturizer With Vitamin E SPF20

product_description:
Super soothing facial wipes for cleansing sensitive skin.
Formulated to care for even the most irritable of skin, the Miracle Oil Calm & Soothe PrimRose Oil 2 In 1 Cleansing Moisturising Face Wipes are the perfect purifying addition to your skincare routine. The primrose infused wipes work tirelessly to lift stubborn makeup and oil whilst ridding the surface of dulling impurities meaning you can be confident in your glowing, soothed skin no matter what!
product_name: Miracle Oil Calm & Soothe Primrose Oil 2 In 1 Cleansing & Moisturising Facial Wipes

product_description:
Mario Badescu Kera Moisturiser (59ml) is a richly moisturising lotion that's specially formulated for dry, couperose and sensitive skin types.
With ingredients such as Keratoplast and Oatmeal it will calm and soothe skin, reducing redness and irritation. Skin is hydrated, nourished and soothed.

Zelens Intense Defence Antioxidant Serum is a luxurious treatment which helps to fight free radical attack for a healthier complexion.
Formulated with a potent blend of Antioxidants including Vitamin C, Shiso Leaf and Green Tea, Intense Defence Antioxidant Serum helps to fortify the skin and defend against oxidative stress whilst promoting skin renewal and natural reparative benefits. This advanced protective serum also offers anti irritant, anti-inflammatory and antibacterial properties and helps to prevent sensitivity and soothe reactivity to the elements.
Echinacea enhances the skin's natural healing process and boosts the skin's immune system whilst a blend of Hyaluronic Acid, Vegetal Proteins and Tri Peptides work harmoniously to enhance collagen production to firm the skin and stimulate elastin and collagen production to smooth the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Sesame Protein provides long lasting moisture and significantly reduces the appearance of wrinkles whilst Vitamin E acts as a major Antioxidant to deliver strong protective effects against UV induced skin damage.
Providing a strong protective barrier against all three types of harmful free radicals, Intense Defence Antioxidant Serum improves skin texture and leaves the skin looking hydrated, healthy and firm.

A light reflecting skin-treatment in a warm tanned hue.
Formulated to deliver a soft, radiant glow to lacklustre skin, the Photography Fluid Tan Opacity 8% is perfect for wearing alone or under your favourite foundation. The weightless serum-like radiance enhancer harbours an array of skin-loving ingredients that work in synergy to create an instantly blurred, camera ready finish. Whether you prefer a natural or full coverage finish this industry must-have will always be the perfect way to prepare.

Mario Badescu Acne Control Kit contains everything you need to clarify and treat problematic skin.
This complete daily care kit keeps skin clean, clear and acne eruptions under control, all packaged in a Mario Badescu tote bag, with a mirror and bath sponge.

EOS Visibly Soft Smooth Sphere Vanilla Mint Lip Balm is limited edition lip balm which moisturises and protects the lips.
Deliciously sweet and refreshing, Visibly Soft Smooth Sphere Vanilla Mint Lip Balm provides lost lasting moisture with a 99% natural formula. Enriched with Shea butter and Vitamin E, Smooth Sphere Vanilla Mint Lip Balm keeps the lips moist, soft and sensationally smooth whilst Vitamin E provides essential Antioxidant protection.
The patented sphere design glides precisely on the lips and imparts a clear veil of moisture and protection whilst the Paraben and Petrolatum free formula nourishes all skin types. The refreshing Vanilla Mint flavour gives the lips the moisture they crave.
product_name: Visibly Soft Smooth Sphere Vanilla Mint Lip Balm 7g

product_description:
A prismatic liquid to blur pores and fine lines.
Working by reflecting light as it hits your face Pore Delete Instant Surface Perfector retouches complexion in real life. With its lightweight, mattifying formula visible pores are reduced, fine lines are blurred and your face won't shine with or without makeup.

Talika Eye Dream is a regenerative nightly mask specially developed for the eye contour skin.
This unique fluid mask helps the fragile skin around the eyes regenerate itself night after night whilst reducing puffiness and moisturising and smoothing the skin. Enriched with Bio-Peptides, Eye Dream stimulates collagen synthesis to reduce wrinkle length and depth by up to 50%.
Soy Protein Extract nourishes and revitalises the skin as it boosts oxygen consumption to reduce dark circles. Eye Dream is also infused with Vitamin F which replenishes Omega lipids and regenerates the skin. This innovative eye treatment allows you to sleep your way to beautiful eyes and leaves your eyes looking refreshed, rejuvenated and youthful.

A hydration imparting face mask developed specifically for dry, dehydrated and normal skin.
Created to boost skin's hydration level, the Camellia Seed Oil & Spirulina Hydrating Face Mask is a dry skin diminishing hero. Bolstered with a number of smoothing and soothing ingredients, this one use pod is the perfect way to bring your skin comfort, dewiness and plumpness.
product_name: Camellia Seed Oil & Spirulina Hydrating Face Mask 5x10ml

product_description:
A facial prepping elixir that smooths, redensifies and calms the skin, making ti ideal for use prior to the application of moisturiser, primer and makeup.
Infused with natural, skin-loving ingredients, Pure Revival Peel delivers fast-acting results that boast longevity. The skin is refreshed, with a lit-from-within glow imparted after just one use. The innovative formula remains non-abrasive on the complexion, yet effectively diminishes the signs of dullness and fatigue by removing dead skin cells. The non-stripping nature of the peel makes this treatment ideal for all skin types.

Jurlique Moisture Replenishing Day Cream is a rich moisturiser ideal for dry skin.
Infused with Avocado Oil to promote skin softness, Moisture Replenishing Day Cream has rich moisturising properties and provides lost lasting hydration and moisturisation. High in Linoleic Acid, Safflower Oil protects, nurtures and softens skin whilst an emollient rich blend of Shea Butter and Beeswax soften and smooth skin to keep it supple and healthy.
Moisture Replenishing Day Cream deeply hydrates skin and protects against environmental damage, leaving dry skin feeling smooth, moisturised and comfortable.
colour: Moisture Replenishing Day Cream 125ml – HK $449.80

product_description:
ANTIPODES Ananda Antioxidant Gentle Toner is an Organic facial spritz which brings bliss to stressed and damaged skin.
Dermatologically approved for sensitive skin, Ananda Antioxidant Gentle Toner is enriched with a premium Botanical blend and features the natural Minerals in pure 15,000 year old Waiwera Artesian Water. Used to address the drying signs of ageing, this key Spring Water delivers beneficial nutrients and antioxidants to the skins epidermal layer.
Bulgarian Rose Oil acts as a relaxing tonic for mature skin and eczema sufferers whilst Raspberry Seed Oil nourishes the skin with essential Fatty Acids and Omegas 3 & 6. Ananda Antioxidant Gentle Toner is also enriched with Mamaku Black Fern which firms and protects the skin whilst bringing a new leash of life to ageing skin cells.
Ananda Antioxidant Gentle Toner delivers an instant moisture boost to the skin and helps to prevent premature signs of ageing caused through exposure to environmental aggressors. An essential step in any skin care regime, Ananda Antioxidant Gentle Toner leaves the skin looking glowing, healthy and radiant.

Resultime Cleansing Milk is a lightweight cleanser for all skin types.
Enriched with Collagen, Elastin, Vitamin E and Borage Oil, Cleansing Milk hydrates and comforts the skin whilst gently removing all traces of makeup and impurities. Specially formulated to preserve youthfulness, Cleansing Milk is free from Parabens and is sure to be a Beauty Bay best-seller.
As seen in Vogue and loved by celebrity facialist Arezoo, Cleansing Milk leaves the skin feeling fresh, comfortable and supple.

Fillerina Dermo Cosmetic Filler Treatment Grade 2 eradicates visible wrinkles and expression lines without the use of needles.
Fabulously transforming ageing skin, Dermo Cosmetic Filler Treatment Grade 2 makes the face appear plumper, more radiant and youthful. Containing a unique blend of six Hyaluronic Acids that plump up the skin elegantly, this incredible age-defying beauty essential tackles the areas that require a gentle boost of hydration and lift.
Used once a day consistently for fourteen days, the skin will undergo a dramatic transformation as the texture, appearance and tone will all be corrected. Eliminate the appearance of visible lines before they deepen and mellow out existing expression wrinkles with this revolutionary filler treatment.
Dermo Cosmetic Filler Treatment Grade 2 includes a Dermo Cosmetic Gel Filler and a Nourishing Film which work together beautifully to iron out facial creases.Recover the skin's former smoothness and suppleness with this two phase treatment. Phase 1 penetrates the skin's lower layers to secure an uber-hydration effect whilst plumping up the skin glamorously, meanwhile Phase 2 creates a weightless barrier against dehydration with a cocktail of skin-loving ingredients including moisture-rich Vitamin E, Meadowfoam Seed Oil and Shea Butter.
Forget about cosmetic surgery with this flawlessly effective alternative.

Three radiance boosting face masks for lacklustre skin.
Infused with nourishing ingredients, the Oh K! Coconut Water Fibre Face Mask (3pk) effectively restores skin's natural hydration levels. Shaped to perfectly fit the contours of your face, the fibrous face mask delivers moisture deep into the skin, whilst helping cleanse skin, too for radiant results.
product_name: Oh K! Coconut Water Fibre Face Mask 3x25ml

product_description:
An anti-ageing sheet mask.
Increasing skin's elasticity, Raccoon AnimalSheet Mask reduces fine lines and deeply moisturises. With a fun raccoon print, place over the face and leave to soak for a smooth, youthful looking complexion.

A sheet mask for skin that's starting to show the first signs of ageing.
Packed with multivitamins, Face Inc by Nails Inc 40 Winks Anti-Ageing Sheet Mask is perfect for skin that needs a youthful lift. With a glamorous pouted print to improve your complexion from the get go the mask firms, moisturises and evens skin tone in just fifteen minutes, for a face that feels younger for longer.
product_name: Face Inc by Nails Inc 40 Winks Anti Ageing Sheet Mask

product_description: Mario Badescu Chamomile Cleansing Lotion (236ml) is an extremely gentle toner to soothe and calm dry and red skin.

Talika Lipocils & Black is a revolutionary 2-step system to stimulate lash growth whilst lengthening and volumising the lashes.
Derived from reconstructive technologies, Lipocils & Black combines the best-selling Lipocils Eyelash Treatment Gel with a gorgeous deep black, volumising mascara. Enriched with strengthening Horse Chestnut, soothing Witch Hazel and St John’s Wort, Lipocils & Black offers two steps to combat brittle, short, sparse or dull lashes.
After 60 years of experience in eyelash growth, Lipocils & Black is Talika’s first mascara. Paired with the innovative Lipocils, this dual ended wand system is easy and convenient to use and will leave the lashes naturally stronger, longer and thicker with a glossy black, voluminous and defined appearance.

A gentle face cleanser.
With a charcoal base, Creamy Face Cleanser deeply and effectively clears the pores of dirt, makeup and product build up. To be used daily, massage over skin to remove even the toughest of makeup for a beautifully clean complexion.

Mattifying drops to instantly reduce shine at any step in your routine, perfect for oily to combination skin types.
Custom Blot Drops can be worn alone or mixed into any liquid based product with a drop dispense system for the ultimate fuss free customisation. The innovative silk like formula holds a complex cocktail of ingredients to control excess oil and clear pores. Light diffusing particles reduce the appearance of fine lines and pores whilst chamomile extract soothes and tones the skins texture for a flawless matte finish.

Talika Lash Cream stimulates eyelash growth for thicker, healthier eyelashes.
Used for more than 50 years by millions of women, this iconic lash conditioning cream is enriched with a natural blend of ingredients which work synergistically to naturally grow and thicken your eyelashes.
Talika is the secret of many movie stars and other glamorous women and the unique formula, never divulgated, remains the only product officially recognised and allowed to claim its effect on the actual growth (or regrowth) of the eyelashes.
Infused with Nettle Extract and Soy Lecithin, Lash Cream stimulates eyelash growth whilst Horse Chestnut strengthens the lashes and stimulates blood circulation. Witch Hazel and St Johns Wort provide anti-inflammatory benefits whilst Allantoin and Apple Extract hydrates, softens, calms and refreshes the skin.
Clinically proven to have a significant increase in lash growth and thickness, Lash Cream is the ideal night treatment to leave the lashes looking lusciously long, thick and healthy.
_Did you know? Lash Cream was originally formulated as an antibacterial cream to heal eye contour injuries. Its amazing side effect on the lashes was discovered by chance by Danielle Roches, a Medical Doctor during WWII. _

Cellex-C Fresh Complexion Mist is a pale, leaf green herbal based toner containing alpha and beta hydroxy acids designed to gently stimulate your skins natural sloughing action to reveal a fresh, glowing complexion. This mist is a twentieth century formulation translation of the ancient and traditional Japanese ''Beauty Water'' and is suitable for even the most delicate skin. This is great for using after exercising or cleansing to help tighten, tone and refresh the skin, and it is suitable for all skin types.

A hydrating cleanser.
With a non-rinse formula, Coconut Ultra Hydrating Micellar Cleansing Water effectively cleanses and moisturises in one simple step. Made with 95% natural ingredients, swipe over skin to remove impurities and create a soft, smooth complexion.
product_name: Coconut Ultra Hydrating Micellar Cleansing Water 230ml

product_description:
StarSkin Red Carpet Ready Hydrating Bio Cellulose Second Skin Face Mask is an Organic facial treatment for dry and dehydrated skin types.
Designed to restore a dewy radiance to dry, dull, lacklustre and dehydrated complexions, Red Carpet Ready Hydrating Bio Cellulose Second Skin Face Mask deeply rehydrates, smoothes and rejuvenates the skin with a powerful serum complex.
The perfect way to prep the skin for your red carpet debut or any special occasion, Red Carpet Ready Hydrating Bio Cellulose Second Skin Face Mask works to deliver a celebrity inspired complexion in just 20 minutes.
Utilising StarSkin's exclusive Bio Cellulose which is infused with naturally fermented, Vitamin rich Coconut Juice, this innovative sheet mask contours closely to the face to infuse the skin with a conditioning blend of Amino Acids and Brown Algae for exceptional anti-ageing results.
Also enriched with a balancing andregenerating blend of Porst and Purslane, Red Carpet Ready Hydrating Bio Cellulose Second Skin Face Mask also utilises Xylitol to enhance the skin's barrier function and promote moisture retention for a more hydrated complexion.
Awaken the skin to a dramatically dewy, supple and illuminated complexion which is ready for any occasion.
product_name: Red Carpet Ready Hydrating Bio Cellulose Second Skin Face Mask

product_description:
Oskia Nutri Active Day Cream hydrates, repairs and protects the skin.
This multi-active day cream not only provides long lasting hydration and essential nutrients to improve skin cell health and efficiency, Nutri Active Day Cream also smoothes and prevents the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Enriched with Swiss Apple Stem Cells, Nutri Active Day Cream prolongs the life of healthy skin cells and helps to repair and protect DNA to reduce fine lines and wrinkles. Milk Peptides immediately lift, firm and tone the skin by increasing the natural levels of Hyaluronic Acid in the skin whilst O3 Stressed Yeast Lysate increases the skins energy to stimulate new tissue growth.
Clinically tested with a patent pending, award winning formula, Nutri Active Day Cream is rich in Vitamins A, B2 B3, C, D, E, F & P which work synergistically to replenish lost moisture, restore softness and elasticity and brighten and smooth the skin. Nutri Active Day Cream also protects against skin damage, UV and the damaging effects of the environment.
Suitable for all skin types, this highly effective, anti-ageing moisturiser is Paraben free and leaves the complexion silky soft, hydrated, and radiant with fine lines and wrinkles visibly diminished.

Cellex-C Fade Away Gel is a green tea coloured, oil free, aqueous solution containing a full complement of patented signature ingredients plus plant glycosides. It dramatically lightens the appearance of age and sun spots using only natural chemicals. This is suitable for most skin types, except the most sensitive and is Hydroquinone free.

Insitut Esthederm Osmoclean Lightening Buffing Mask is a formula that combines an exfoliant and a treatment mask to eliminate dead cells and even the skin tone. An intelligent cleanser which eliminates the bad bacterias and preserves the good ones. Suitable for all skin types with uneven skin and smokers.

Alpha H Essential Hydration Cream is a luxurious, aromatic moisturiser that is fabulously suitable for all skin types.
Enriched with Ylang Ylang and Arnica, Essential Hydration Cream provides the skin with round-the-clock hydration and is enriched with Bio-Mineral and Peptides to repair, soothe and revitalise the skin. With the ability to de-stress the skin whilst simultaneously offering nourishing properties, this sophisticated cream ensures the skin remains soothed, for a radiant, youthful appearance.
The innovative non-Glycolic formula is ideal for broken capillaries and diffused redness whilst Peppermint Minerals and Essential Fatty Acids work harmoniously to bring immediate relief and comfort dehydrated, irritated and sensitive skin. Rich in Antioxidants and Essential Oils, Essential Hydration Cream promotes healthy collagen production and neutralises free radical damage for a healthier complexion.
Embrace a more youthful, healthier complexion with the help of this ground-breaking elixir from the skincare specialists at Alpha H.

Antipodes Moisture Boost Mini Collection is a skin-hydrating duo ideal for all skin types but especially perfect for thirsty skin.
Two of Antipode's best-loved moisturising wonders come together to improve moisture levels in dry parched skin.
Packed with Vitamins and Antioxidants, this face oil and day cream duo work together to leave the skin feeling refreshed, revived and utterly gorgeous! Both of the light yet effective products defend the skin from environmental aggressors and ageing, leaving the skin picture perfect ready for any occasion!
Divine Face Oil 10ml - Divine Face Oil is enriched with essential Vitamins and Antioxidants which repair parched and damaged skin with additional moisturising and conditioning benefits. The perfect nutrient treatment for daily use, Divine Face Oil is especially ideal for dry and combination complexions and is suitable for all skin types. With a Vegetarian formula, Divine Face Oil leaves the skin looking smooth, radiant and youthful with a noticeable improvement in skin tone and texture.
Vanilla Pod Hydrating Day Cream 15ml - Vanilla Pod Hydrating Day Cream is a deeply nourishing and hydrating moisturiser for all skin types. Light and refreshing yet incredibly nutritious, Vanilla Pod Hydrating Day Cream has a revolutionary Antioxidant rich formula powered by Vinanza Grape from award-winning Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc Grape Seeds; this key beautifying ingredient helps to energise the skin whilst improving elasticity and firmness and preventing moisture loss. Native New Zealand Manuka Honey helps to keep the skin completely clean and blemish free with antibacterial properties and Rosehip Oil helps to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and nurtures the skin with naturally high levels of Vitamins A & C and essential Fatty Acids.

Eight revitalizing face pads.
Made with real orange extract, Orange Fruit Slice Pads cool and soothe skin. In a resealable pouch, use as many as desired over the eyes, face and neck for a fun and convenient re-energising treatment with a natural fruity scent.

Peter Thomas Roth Un Wrinkle Line Smoothing Lotion is a luxurious toner which removes surface impurities whilst smoothing, softening and hydrating the skin.
This lightly toning lotion is formulated with Peter Thomas Roth’s proprietary turbo-charged Neuropeptide and Peptide Complex and targets the appearance of six of the most stubborn deep wrinkles and expression lines.
Un Wrinkle Line Smoothing Lotion is enriched with the Un-Wrinkle Turbo blend of 18 potent anti-ageing Neuropeptides blended with Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamins A, C and E to nourish, hydrate and treat the skin. Flecked with 24 Karat Gold, Un Wrinkle Line Smoothing Lotion has a silky consistency which helps to smooth the skin and envelope it in an invisible veil of moisture and prepare it for the optimal performance of following skincare treatments.
Alcohol free, Un Wrinkle Line Smoothing Lotion provides essential antioxidant protection against free-radical damage and works to help send signals to skin to help activate anti-aging mechanisms that effectively minimise the appearance of deep wrinkles and expression lines.
Un Wrinkle Line Smoothing Lotion leaves the skins surface smooth, perfect and flawless whilst softening, toning and refreshing the skin.

Yes To Cucumbers Daily Gel Cleanser is a soothing face wash for sensitive skin types.
Packed with Organic Cucumbers, Cucumbers Daily Gel Cleanser contains a fusion of rejuvenating Vitamins which soothe and soften the skin whilst keeping the skin supple and fresh with cooling properties. Aloe Vera offers natural moisturisation and skin refreshment whilst Green Tea effectively combats oxidative stress and treats troubled skin and breakouts.
96% Natural and free from Petroleum, SLS and Parabens, Cucumbers Daily Gel Cleanser gently lifts away dirt and impurities without irritating sensitive skin and leaves the complexion looking soothed, calm and clean.

Mario Badescu The Moisture Magnet (Pentavitin) SPF15 (60ml) containing Hyaluronic Acid and Pentavitin blend locks in skin’s natural moisture, while the nourishing and antioxidant benefits of Vitamin A keep skin, smooth and soft.

ANTIPODES Hallelujah Cleanser is a fragrant and natural cream cleanser which promotes healthier skin.
Gently removing daily impurities from the skin with an Avocado Oil base, Hallelujah Cleanser is infused with an aromatic blend of Lime and Patchouli Essential Oils which work wonderfully to refresh, cleanse and uplift the skin.
Suitable for daily use and ideal for all skin types, this vegetarian friendly cleanser promotes a radiant glow with Carrot Seed Oil and leaves the skin beautifully clean, radiant and nourished.

Peter Thomas Roth Instant Firm X Eye instantly transforms the skin around the eye by tightening and smoothing the eye area.
Enriched with Magnesium Complexes and Fennel Seed Extract this luxurious eye treatment instantly minimises the appearance of crow’s feet, fine lines and deep wrinkles by smoothing, firming and tightening the delicate skin around the eyes. Easy to apply simply leave to dry and rinse away to erase fine lines and wrinkles and diminish under-eye puffiness.
Eyes are left firmer, smoother and more youthful looking.

Mario Badescu The Brightening Kit is a 4 piece set of skin-brightening and anti-ageing skincare essentials.
Featuring five specially formulated formulas which are enriched with Vitamins, Alpha Hydroxy Acids and Plant and Fruit Extracts to bring you a revitalised and even-toned complexion, The Brightening Kit offers a complete regime from a cleanser and toner to a serum, treatment and facial mask.
Diminishing the appearance of dark spots and sun damage, these beautiful, skin caring products defend the skin and encourage skin cell renewal to bring you a complexion that looks and feels amazing.
Naturally soothing and calming your skin, The Brightening Kit intensely hydrates your skin for a youthful outlook.

Mario Badescu Cleansing Milk With Carnation & Rice Oil (177ml) is best for sensitive and dry skin. This creamy, tissue-off cleanser gently cleanses all face make-up and debris from skinÉs surface without leaving it dry.
product_name: Cleansing Milk With Carnation & Rice Oil

product_description: Mario Badescu Whitening Mask (60ml) is a hydrating mask that will help brighten uneven skin tones and gently reduce the look of old acne scars and discolorations from the sun.

The perfect solution for those with dry and dehydrated skin types, this four piece collection intensely moisturises and refreshes in just four days. Suitable for all skin types and dermatologically tested, PHA+Bio Peel Resurfacing Facial Pads are the next generation in facial peeling and uses Polyhydroxy Acids with Alpha and Beta Hydroxy Acids to gently exfoliate the skin without irritation.
These pre-soaked resurfacing facial pads are infused with a blend of four different Hydroxy Acids. PHA (Polyhydroxy Acids) are natural, safe and non-irritating; derived from Lactose, Lactobionic Acid contains Gluconic Acid and Galactose, which occur naturally in the skin. Polyxydroxy Acids enhance exfoliation of the outermost layer of the skin which helps to and normalise the thickness of the skin. Lactobionic Acid has strong humectant properties and works by binding atmospheric water to form a natural gel-film that gives hydration, plumpness and smoothness to the skin. This technologically advanced ingredient also demonstrates excellent antioxidant properties and prevents skin damage caused by free radicals and oxidative stress.
PHA+Bio Peel Resurfacing Facial Pads utilises two bio-available AHA’s (Alpha Hydroxy Acids); Lactic Acid and Citric Acid. These naturally derived AHAs work harmoniously to act as an exfoliant and boost production of collagen. These luxurious ingredients also allow other ingredients to penetrate deeper into the skin for enhanced benefits and provides effective moisturisation.
Salicylic Acid, a form of Beta Hydroxy Acid (BHA) gently exfoliates the skin and helps to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and also works to deeply cleanse pores and reduce their size.
Providing the skin with an effective resurfacing action, PHA+Bio Peel Resurfacing Facial Pads improves the skins surface texture and tone to achieve a healthier, radiant complexion. Fine lines, wrinkles and enlarged pores are minimised for a flawless, more youthful appearance.

Featuring a luxurious formula of Persian Silk Tree Extract, Cactus Flower Extract and Retinol, No Wrinkles Night Repair Serum prepares the skin for nightly reparations and helps to promote youthful radiance.
This rich night serum attacks the Glyco-toxins that build up when you don’t get enough sleep to reduce the signs of fatigue and premature ageing. No Wrinkles Night Repair Serum helps your regular night cream penetrate deeper into the skin allowing for greater benefits.
No Wrinkles Night Repair Serum allows you to wake up to a youthful complexion and radiant looking skin regardless of how little sleep you’ve had.

An ultra-moisturising sheet mask ideal for all skin types.
Boasting incredible moisture supplying ingredients, the Coconut Ultra Hydrating Paper Mask is the perfect way to indulge your skin. The mask consists of a unique breathable paper enveloped in a hydrating and smoothing serum, which deeply penetrates the skin for an intense hit of hydration that leaves skin glowing with health.

A collection of lucrative facial masks that soothe and calm irritated, sensitive and problem skin types. The perfect collection of treatments for those with skin issues and ailments, Sensitive & Troubled Skin 4 Day Intensive Skin Treatment Collection provides an intense four day course which will leave the complexion refreshed, revitalised, healthy and clear.
product_name: Sensitive & Troubled Skin 4 Day Intensive Skin Treatment Collection 4x10ml

product_description:
Peter Thomas Roth Cucumber Detox Bouncy Hydrating Gel delivers powerfully youthful and hydrated results to the complexion after just one use.
Sweeping exquisitely over the complexion with a gel-like texture, Cucumber Detox Bouncy Hydrating Gel provides professional-finish results for the skin in terms of calming irritation, protecting against damaging environmental radicals and replenishing the youthful plumpness that the ravages of time has disturbed.
Formulated with Vitamins A, C and E, Cucumber Extract and Hyaluronic Acid, this sumptuously indulgent yet highly-effective moisturising gel masterfully soothes the skin whilst simultaneously boosting the Antioxidant levels and protecting against daily aggressors.
With the ability to tone and firm the skin, Cucumber Detox Bouncy Hydrating Gel also magnificently brightens dull and lacklustre skin types, making it a certified beauty essential for the harsh winter months.
Get the perfect balance of moisture, care and protection and marvel in your new youthful complexion with Cucumber Detox Bouncy Hydrating Gel.

Cellex-C Seline-E is a smooth, rich moisturiser that is perfect for night-time application over Cellex-C Serum. Seline-E's powerful combination of anti-oxidants-vitamin E and bioflavonoids-enhance the potency of vitamin C and provide anti-oxidant moisture protection for the skin, day or night. this product is suitable for normal skin.

A lightweight, easily absorbed serum which works to rehydrate skin on a multi-depth level.
This ultra-pure serum combines 3 types of hyaluronic acid at varying molecular sizes with Vitamin B5 to offer lasting hydration and visible plumping of the skin at all levels of the dermis. Moisture retention, lipid barrier strength, and surface hydration are all improved, leading to smoother, softer, healthier skin.

Verso Dark Spot Fix 6 is a patented treatment which helps to reduce the appearance of minor, unwanted dark spots.
This fading and lightening corrective treatment can be safely used during the daytime and help to diminish and lighten the appearance of darker patches on the skin with regular use. Enriched with the highest dose of the innovative and revolutionary Retinol 8 Complex which infuses the skin with 8 times as much Vitamin A as regular Retinol, Dark Spot Fix 6 is perfect for complexions showing darker patches due to age, sun damage and past acne.
Ideal for all skin types, including sensitive complexions, Dark Spot Fix 6 is Paraben and Sulphate free and leaves the complexion looking smooth, more even toned and radiant with a healthier appearance.

A twelve piece mask with a skin firming action
Comprised of twelve individual sunflower shaped masks in a variety of sizes, the Sun Flower Mask Sheet is an effective way to firm and tone specific areas of the skin. Infused with an elasticity boosting serum, the unique mask treatment leaves the skin feeling firmer and looking brighter.

Mario Badescu AHA & Ceramide Moisturiser (59ml) is an oil free, daily moisturiser, ideal for combination and oily skin types.
Rich in alpha hydroxyl acids, this daily hydrating cream also contains lemon extract and soothing aloe vera gel and works to rejuvenate and revive dull, congested skin. Radiance and texture are improved, whilst sun spots and skin pigmentation are evened out.

Rehydration serum with 5 forms of hyaluronic compounds to target multiple surface levels.
With smaller molecules of hyaluronic acid, Low Molecular HA Multi Depth Rehydration Booster is able to penetrate deeper and absorb easier to hydrate and repair damaged tissue and lock in moisture. Skin becomes softer, plumper and more radiant with regular use.
product_name: Low Molecular HA Multi Depth Rehydration Booster 30ml

product_description:
ANTIPODES Aura Manuka Honey Treatment Mask is an award winning face mask which intensely hydrates all skin types.
Ideal for blemish prone skin, Aura Manuka Honey Treatment Mask utilises antibacterial Manuka Honey to powerfully draw moisture to the skin for intense hydration. A multi-purpose moisturising, cleansing and anti-oxidising treatment, Aura Manuka Honey Treatment Mask is the ultimate solution for clearing spots and blemishes for a clearer, healthier complexion.
Pohutukawa Extract deeply conditions and moisturises the skin whilst providing antioxidant and antiseptic benefits whilst a sensuous infusion of Vanilla Pod and Mandarin bring peace and balance to your aura.
The perfect weekly pampering treat, Aura Manuka Honey Treatment Mask leaves the skin feeling beautifully hydrated with a youthful, radiant glow and improved hydration and balance.

A rubber, peel off face mask.
Containing two applications, Mermaid Marine Peel Off Mask draws out impurities to cleanse and reduce shine. Formulated with 97% natural ingredients, mix and apply to the face for a cooled and refreshed complexion with an easy, gentle removal.

A revitalising sheet mask.
A gentle exfoliator, Pure Essence Mask Sheet Acai Berry softens the outer layer of the skin. Rich with vitamins and nutrients, brightness is restored, elasticity is strengthened and moisture levels are rebalanced.
product_name: Pure Essence Mask Sheet Acai Berry 20ml

product_description:
This Works No Wrinkles Wonder Essence is a luxurious daily treatment developed to refine and reduce skin imperfections.
Inspired by Asian ritual essences, No Wrinkles Wonder Essence is infused with a powerful blend of natural Protease Enzymes which sweep away dead surface skin cells and penetrates deep into the layers of the skin to eliminate old and damaged cells. Protective Antioxidants and Hyaluronic Acid work harmoniously to rebalance the rhythm of the skin and provides essential rehydration.
The gentle, non-abrasive exfoliation action combines with aromatic Mastic Resin to promote cellular renewal and the regulation of sebum to reduce the appearance of skin imperfections such as fine lines, wrinkles and dilated pores.
Perfect for reducing shine and protecting the skin from future damage, No Wrinkles Wonder Essence brightens and rejuvenates the skin to leave the complexion looking even, smooth, radiant and refreshed.

Cellex-C High Potency Serum is a lightweight, oil-free formulation containing the full complement of Cellex-C signature ingredients. The patented complex in this serum works to encourage a firm, youthful, elastic quality to the skin. Regular use of this product will help to make skin look 5-10 years younger! This is suitable for all skin types except the most sensitive.

A calming cleanser.
Leaving skin glowing and hydrated, Cucumbers Calming Micellar Cleansing Water cleanses and refreshes. Lifting impurities from the skin, the 95% natural formula effectively cleanses whilst soothing and cooling sensitivity.

A deeply nourishing overnight face mask.
Working overtime whilst you sleep, the Oh K! Sleep Mask boasts a rich, creamy texture that delivers intense moisture and hydration deep into the skin. Packed to the brim with nourishing ingredients, it leaves you with smooth, glowing skin even without 8 hours rest.

Talika Eyebrow Lipocils Expert is a high performance brow treatment which thickens and defines the eyebrows.
Enriched with naturally sourced active ingredients including 13 Plant Extracts, Eyebrow Lipocils Expert stimulates natural brow growth and boosts melanin production and the natural eyebrow pigment. Developed to create up to 75% fuller brows, Eyebrow Lipocils Expert offers renewed results in as little as 6 weeks and is perfect for brows which have  been traumatised by sun exposure and over plucking.
Boasting visible results after the first use, Eyebrow Lipocils Expert leaves the brows looking naturally thicker and more structured.

Mario Badescu Glycolic Acid Toner is a gentle exfoliating toner which is perfect for dull, tired skin.
Specially formulated with 2% Glycolic Acid, Grapefruit Extract and Aloe Gel, Glycolic Acid Toner gently exfoliates, refreshes and stimulates dry and congested complexions. A Beauty Bay best-seller, Glycolic Acid Toner helps to reduce discoloration from old acne scarring whilst diminishing build-up which causes the skin to look tired and dull.

A micellar water for sensitive skin.
Cleansing, toning and moisturising, Cotton Micellar Cleansing Water is a multi-tasking, no rinse formula. Made with 95% natural ingredients, use on sensitive and allergy-prone skin for a deep and hydrating cleanse.

A brightening sheet mask.
Lightening dark spots, Pure Essence Mask Sheet Rice brightens the complexion and fights pigmentation. Suitable for sensitive skin, the nourishing sheet mask soaks the skin with gentle, moisturising ingredients for increased elasticity and smoothness with reduced irritation.

Paul & Joe Creamy Facial Foam gently removes dirt and impurities from the skin whilst infusing essential moisture.
This luxurious foaming cleanser creates a whipped cream-like lather that stays firm and fine whilst it sweeps dirt, makeup and impurities from the complexion. Rich in Emollients, Creamy Facial Foam infuses the skin with vital moisture and leaves the complexion feeling silky soft and radiant.
Creamy Facial Foam is formulated with refreshing Orange Water and has the mood lifting effects of Orange Oil to make your skincare routine blissful and indulgent.

A super lightweight skin serum designed to diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Created to tackle some of the most common skin complaints that come with ageing, the It's Skin Power 10 Formula WR Effector is a must-have for maturing complexions. The rich formula features a blend of effective natural ingredients that work in synergy to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, leaving skin with an effortlessly luminous glow.
product_name: It's Skin Power 10 Formula WR Effector 30ml

product_description:
Dr Brandt Microdermabrasion contains pharmaceutical grade crystals to polish away dead skin cells which visibly smoothes and refines, leaving your skin radiant. These diamond shaped crystals exfoliate evenly without scratching or irritating the skin while smoothing fine lines and wrinkles and improving the overall texture of the skin. Ideal for the face, arms hands and neck.
This new formulation has more soothing ingredients to improve its effectiveness without irritation.

ANTIPODES Juliet Brightening Gel Cleanser is a high performance cleansing gel which brightens and rejuvenates the complexion.
Perfect for normal, oily and blemish prone skin, Juliet Brightening Gel Cleanser utilises the exfoliating energies of New Zealand Kiwi Superfruit and vibrant Hibiscus Flower which work harmoniously to eliminate daily impurities whilst nurturing the skin with vital Vitamins and restoring brightness, clarification and plumpness to the complexion.
Antibacterial powers from Manuka Honey combine with antioxidant packed Vinanza Grape to reduce and balance oil production for clearer skin whilst protecting against free radical damage. Pure plant fragrances from Fresh Green Apple and Cardamom refresh the senses whilst the Vegetarian approved formula leaves the skin looking bright, clear and radiant with your healthiest glow ever.

A concentrated vitamin C serum for smoother, brighter skin.
C25 Stabilised Vitamin C Booster is lightweight, effective and easily absorbed. Stabilising the vitamin C means it won't oxidise and therefore its smoothing, brightening and anti-ageing properties are more effective for longer.

Paul and Joe Lip Treatment balm is a 2 in 1 lip balm which both primes and moisturises the lips.
Enriched with Olive Oil to lock and maintain essential moisture in the lips, this hydrating lip balm has a sweet Almond and Spearmint flavour which soothes and cools the lips. The indulgent formula repairs flaky damaged lips whilst also acting as a primer ensuring your pout is ready to receive a flush of long-lasting colour!
Packaged in a cute, pink floral tin, Lip Treatment Balm is a handbag essential for those on-the-go moments.

Plump dry skin and deliver a rich burst of moisture with Filorga Hydra-Hyal Intensive Hydrating Plumping Concentrate - effective on even the most dehydrated complexions.
It's packed with four kinds of our favourite moisture magnet, hyaluronic acid, all working at different molecular weights to replenish skin's hydration at every level.
High molecular weight hyaluronic acid holds up to 1000 times its weight in water, enabling it to capture water on the surface of the skin and smooth dehydration lines. Meanwhile, a medium molecular provides deeper hydration, as this kind of hyaluronic acid is small in size, so able to penetrate further.
Even smaller and with shorter chains is low molecular weight hyaluronic acid, which allows for an intense plumping effect as it penetrates the foundation layers of your skin. It also promotes the stimulation of fibroblasts, the cells responsible for generating connective tissue and producing collagen.
Finally, an encapsulated weight of hyaluronic acid means a gradual release of the plumping molecule is delivered into the skin. Teamed with skin-softening Red Seaweed and Galanga Leaves, pores receive 40% increase in hydration after just 30 minutes of wearing Hydra-Hyal.
product_name: Hydra Hyal Intensive Hydrating Plumping Concentrate 30ml

product_description:
Cellex-C Advanced C Serum is a high performance treatment which dramatically reduces the visible signs of ageing.
Designed to help you look 5 to 10 years younger, Advanced C Serum has a well-tolerated formulation which can be used by the majority without causing any troublesome reactions. High levels of L-Ascorbic Acid work harmoniously with Antioxidants to protect against oxidation and promote collagen production.
Hydrolysed Ascorbic Acid promotes collagen synthesis whilst Grape Seed Extract nutritionally supports the micro-vascular health of the skin by protecting cells within capillaries from free radical damage. Sure to be the most important skin saving step in your daily regime, Advanced C Serum helps to increase the elasticity and resilience of the skin to greatly reduce the appearance of lines and wrinkles.
Advanced C Serum is also infused with Glycine, an important Amino Acid building block which boosts the skin’s natural defence system. Resveratrol protects collagen by supporting existing structures and inhibiting enzyme degradation.
Use regularly, Advanced C Serum will dramatically reduce the visible signs of ageing including fine lines, wrinkles, age spots and sagging skin whilst treated skin appears firmer and smoother with improved texture, tone and overall radiance.

A radiance and renewal duo.
Containing two of Alpha H's best-selling skincare products, Exclusive Perfect Renewal Collection works to treat and protect. Gently exfoliating, tone and moisturise the skin to smooth fine lines and wrinkles whilst evening skin tone and revealing a youthful complexion.
product_name: Liquid Gold + Triple Action Cleanser Exclusive Perfect Renewal Collection

product_description:
Yes To Cucumbers Calming Facial Mask is a gentle moisture boost for tired, sensitive skin.
Nutrient rich and featuring ingredients such as organic cucumber and green tea extract, it gives skin vital hydration and rejuvenates a tired complexion. Skin is soothed, radiant and feels soft and silky.

An impurity ridding face wipe ideal for oily to combination skin types.
Tomatoes Detoxifying Charcoal Facial Wipes are an essential for the daily cleansing of troubled skin. Infused with extracts that work to care for the skin, the wipes help to rid the complexion of impurities as well as stubborn makeup and dirt leaving you looking and feeling completely refreshed.
