99% Natural and free from Petroleum, Parabens and SLS, Tomatoes Daily Balancing Moisturiser is enriched with Tomatoes which offer antioxidant protection and anti-inflammatory benefits. This key ingredient also helps to protect the skin from environmental aggressors which contribute to clogged pores and breakouts whilst balancing the skin and controlling oil and sebum production.
Red Tea helps to keep the complexion looking clear and healthy whilst Watermelon offers intense hydration and utilises natural Fruit Acids to smooth and revitalise the skin. Free from Parabens, Petroleum and SLS, Tomatoes Daily Balancing Moisturiser is also enriched with powerful sebum absorbers which help to control breakouts and prevent acne and leaves the complexion looking smooth, hydrated and clear.

Peter Thomas Roth Cucumber Detox Foaming Cleanser is an indulgent cleanser which purifies and detoxifies the skin of impurities.
Perfect for all skin types, this gentle cleanser contains natural Cucumber Extract, Sugarcane and Sugar Maple Extract to encourage cell turnover whilst calming and soothing irritated skin.
Added Glycerin and Sodium PCA cleanses and hydrates the skin whilst locking in moisture to reveal a healthier, refreshed appearance. The Alcohol and Sulphate free blend contains Vitamins C & E that help protect against free radical attacks.
The blend is so gentle that it can be used around the eyes to remove eye makeup and with its fresh scent and hydrating properties; Cucumber De-Tox Foaming Cleanser is a welcome addition to your skincare regime.
_Tip: For even better results, we recommend using Cucumber Detox Hydrating Serum after cleansing. _

Yes To Grapefruit Correcting Serum is a power charged facial treatment which visibly diminishes the appearance of dark spots in just four weeks.
A radiance booster for dull, lacklustre and pigmented skin types, Grapefruit Correcting Serum is deigned to be worn under your daily moisturiser and helps to firm and brighten the skin whilst correcting uneven skin tone.
Grapefruit, naturally rich in Vitamin C, Lycopene and Antioxidants, works to enhance luminosity to promote softer, smoother skin whilst African Star Grass fades the appearance of age spots, freckles and hyperpigmentation.
A fusion of Mulberry Fruit and White Tea also helps to revitalise and lighten damaged skin, leaving the complexion looking bright, smooth and radiant.

Mario Badescu Kera Moist Cream (29ml) is a rich, intense cream for couperose and sensitive skin.
Formulated with Karatoplast, this extra gentle, daily moisturiser will soothe skin helping to reduce redness and strengthen capillaries. Skin is left soft, smooth and hydrated with a more even tone.

Alpha H Liquid Laser Cleansing Oil is a hydrating cleanser specially formulated for mature skin types.
Ideal for dull, dehydrated and lacklustre complexions, Liquid Laser Cleansing Oil has a high performance, dual function formula which works as a makeup remover and moisturising cleansing oil.
Rich in Antioxidants such as Ferulic Acid and Vitamin C, this innovative cleanser has a lightly textured formula which has been designed to remove even the most stubborn face and eye makeup and assists in expelling impurities and shielding the skin against free radical aggression.
A beautifying blend of Cucumber, Hibiscus and White Mulberry noticeably brighten, sooth and refine the skin's texture and tone whilst balancing the skin's natural pH and leave the complexion looking radiant and youthful.

An intense four-day treatment for dull and lacklustre skin types. Featuring a selection of invigorating and refreshing facial treatments, the coveted Dull Skin 4 Day Intensive Skin Treatment Collection provides a lit-from-within-glow and creates the perfect at-home facial.
product_name: Dull Skin 4 Day Intensive Skin Treatment Collection 4x10ml

product_description:

Pre-emptively attacking barely-there wrinkles with skin-nourishing ingredients like Shea Butter and Wheat Germ Oil, Night Cream Grade 1 also utilises Sweet Almond Oil, Rose Hip Seed Oil and the uber-hydrating Vitamin E to correct the damage that occurs to the skin in everyday life. With exfoliating components like Salicylic Acid, Night Cream Grade 1 guarantees to correct all fine lines and slight wrinkles whilst caring for the rest of the complexion.
Turn back time with Night Cream Grade 1.

product_description:
A collection of four vitamin serums.
Targeting a range of skin problems, Vitamin Profiling Collection allows complete skincare customisation. Suitable for all ages and skin types, mix and match the four different serums for a smooth, bright and youthful complexion.

An eye cream that aims to reduce unwanted lines, dark circles and puffiness on all skin types.

The lightweight moisturising formula absorbs quickly into the skin's deepest tissues to tackle the root cause of ageing, resulting in plumper, firmer and more youthful appearing skin around the eye area in just one week.

A nourishing, gradual tan for the face, which is ideal for all skin types.

product_description:
Zelens Daily Defence Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 30 is a luxurious facial moisturiser which provides essential protection against harmful UV rays.
Specially formulated using Micro Encapsulation Technology, Daily Defence Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 30 provides ultimate protection against UVA and UVB rays to help prevent sun damage. Multiple powerful active ingredients combine to reduce the formation of damaging free radicals and help to repair the skin’s DNA.
Enzyme Endonuclease protects the immune system and acts as an anti-inflammatory whilst accelerating DNA repair as Vitamin E demonstrates strong antioxidant activity. Pseudodipetide Imudilin® offers cytokine-like activity to improve the cellular response and restores defence and helps to reinforce the skin’s natural barrier.
Daily Defence Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 30 has a photo-stable formula which offers protective and reparative benefits and is enriched with a Botanical Antioxidant Complex containing active Molecules from 6 different plants including Ginkgo, Shiso and Green Tea which provides the skin with potent antioxidant protection and prevents oxidative damage.
Tetra-Isopalmitoyl Ascorbic Acid, a stable for of Vitamin C effectively supresses UVB induced pigmentation which helps to lighten pigmentation spots and brighten the complexion whilst stimulating collagen production to diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
A true sun care essential, Daily Defence Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 30 absorbs easily into the skin without any greasy or sticky residue and utilises Hyaluronic Acid to restore skin moisture, leaving the complexion fully protected from the sun with a visible plumpness and youthful radiance.
product_name: Daily Defence Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 30 50ml

nugg Cleanse, Exfoliate, Soothe & Hydrate Face Mask Trial Kit contains a selection of specially formulated face masks that aim to perfect the complexion instantly.

Rosehip BioRegenerate Rapid Radiance Mask gives a radiance boost to dull skin whilst regenerating and repairing damaged skin cells leaving you with soft, smooth skin with a radiant glow.

With repeated use, the skin becomes more resistant and better prepared against solar aggressions whilst noticeably reducing the appearance of sun induced signs of ageing.
